entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo Good. But I don’t think it’s going to take the burden of guilt from you and your administration for forcing nursing homes to accept Covid-19 positive people. I, for one, will never forget what you did to the elderly and the infirmed.
